page.title: 14Leeswood Community Centre
page.content: When two schools combined in 1980 they moved into a new building. The former C.P. school was taken over for use as a Community Centre. In the Community Centre there is one hall,two storerooms,two meeting rooms and one kitchen.There are also three toilets including one for the disabled, a cloakroom,a clinic and changing rooms for Leeswood F.C. The Community Centre is used for events such as dances,discos,Brownies, W.I. meetings,keep fit classes,Over 60's,"Drop In",Whist Drives,bowls, Mother and Toddlers, coffee mornings, bingo and an annual summer fair.It can also be hired for parties and wedding receptions. The headquarters of the Leeswood and District news is in the Community Centre.
